org.gridgain.grid.spi.cloud.jvm
Interface GridJvmCloudSpiMBean

All Superinterfaces:
GridSpiManagementMBean
All Known Implementing Classes:
GridJvmCloudSpi
@GridMBeanDescription(value="MBean that provides access to JVM-based Cloud SPI configuration.")
public interface GridJvmCloudSpiMBean
extends GridSpiManagementMBean

Management bean that provides general administrative and configuration information about JVM-based cloud SPI.
